My Projects

Check out some of my Projects

A restaurant website called Flying Dove that was made with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 4, and JQuery. All the animations were mainly CSS, but some things such as the sticky nav bar and slideshow were made with JQuery. Project Github
A Single Page Application hotel website made in React using react router dom. Allows you to see rooms available, sort through them, and book a room. Project Github
An advanced single page application that uses React and Redux. The program uses AJAX calls to a Heroku server to allow the user to register for an account and login with full authentication. The user who is logged in will be able to create a new post which is displayed publically. Redux was used to manage the server actions and the state of the objects being called. Project Github
My portfolio site was made using html and css, but more specifically it used the pre-processor, Sass. I used Sass for this project because I felt that it was simple enough to just use html and css, but there was so much styling that I needed a way to organize it, so I chose to use Sass. Project Github
